Body: Possible Duplicate:  Where can find older versions of Apps?  Sony LiveView -application dropped the support from the old Android versions -- some problems here -- and now I cannot use it. I want to get the old version of the Sony LiveView but it is not available in the market. It was replaced by the newest Android version. How can I get the old version of App thaw was later available in Android Market?
Title: How can I get old Android softwares?

history.Text: Sony LiveView -application dropped the support from the old Android versions -- some problems [here](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/27666/cannot-establish-connection-with-liveview-with-h8800-android-device) -- and now I cannot use it. I want to get the old version of the Sony LiveView but it is not available in the market. It was replaced by the newest Android version. How can I get the old version of App thaw was later available in Android Market?
How can I get old Android softwares?

> **Possible Duplicate:**  > [Where can find older versions of Apps?](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/14910/where-can-find-older-versions-of-apps)  Sony LiveView -application dropped the support from the old Android versions -- some problems [here](http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/27666/cannot-establish-connection-with-liveview-with-h8800-android-device) -- and now I cannot use it. I want to get the old version of the Sony LiveView but it is not available in the market. It was replaced by the newest Android version. How can I get the old version of App thaw was later available in Android Market?
